item.title: Pelican Setup
item.description: Install Pelican: 1 sudo -H pip install pelican Markdown typogrify Install Pelican themes 1 2 3 git clone --recursive https://github.com/getpelican/pelican-themes sudo /usr/local/bin/pelican-themes --install pelican-themes/Flex sudo chmod 755 /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pelican/themes/Flex Install Pelican plugins 1 git clone --recursive https://github.com/getpelican/pelican-plugins Fetch blog sources 1 2 3 4 git clone git@github.com:j4nu5/j4nu5.github.io.git cd j4nu5.github.io.git git fetch git checkout source Setup for development 1 mkdir cache output Verify plugins root
